mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richmond eclectic magazine: Religious and literary. : At the instance of gentlemen residing in different parts of the country, whose judgment and wishes are entitled to the highest consideration, the undersigned have agreed to undertake the publication of a monthly eclectic magazine, in the city of Richmond, the first number of which will be issued on the 15th of next October / Moses Hoge [and] William Brown
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Brown, William.
Hoge, Moses D. (Moses Drury), 1818-1899
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Handwritten on p. [2], "Persons wishing to subscribe can leave their names with A.N. Cramer Chrlestown." From the Morgan papers, MSS 1275, a gift of Arthur Pforzheimer to the Tracy W. McGregor Library.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond eclectic
Periodicals--Virginia--Richmond.
